context: Tesla remains the dominant EV maker globally but faces intensifying competition. The company expanded into robotaxis, Optimus robot, and energy storage while Cybertruck ramped production.

competitors.name: BYD
competitors.notes: Chinese EV giant, passed Tesla in total sales

competitors.name: Rivian
competitors.notes: US EV startup with trucks and SUVs

competitors.name: Hyundai/Kia
competitors.notes: Ioniq and EV6 gaining market share
